I came from Google's Extended IO Event today

I Came From Google's Extended IO Event today

The peeps from Google were there. The sponsors from Accenture was there. The venue organizers from Globe were there.

Community people.

"How do you code nowadays?"

I asked Sophia, the founder of the Philippine Web Designers's Org, as she sat beside me.

She explained that she used codekit before. Nowadays she uses the sublime text editor.

I told her about a blog post I read. A designer worked using VIM for a week. He hated it.

He decided he'll continue giving it a true - for at least a month.

By the end of the month, he tried to go back to Sublime and couldn't. He had gotten so used to the shortcuts on VIM
